remarks: The antecedent ` A. x ( ph -> x = z ) ` relates to ` E* x ph ` , but is better suited for usage in proofs.  Note that no distinct variable restriction is placed on ` ph ` . This theorem provides a basic working step in proving theorems about ` E* ` or ` E! ` .  (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 3-Oct-2019.)
statement:
wl-lem-moexsb $p |- ( A. x ( ph -> x = z ) -> ( E. x ph <-> [ z / x ] ph ) ) $.
$d x z $.
